description: Derek Parker is a boss who doesn’t take bullshit from his subordinates, and he even uses his professional power for corrupt ends when the day ends and the office packs up ready for home. Derek is currently worried about training two new employees after hours so they know what it means to meet corporate demands. Will Comrad and Nigel take to their training -- which means, will they enjoy sucking Derek Parker’s cock and getting fucked up the ass bareback by his raw cock?
title: Derek Parker Fucks Comrad Blu and Nigel Banks Bareback
